description:
So after Lansing's Serviced video aired, I had a handful of people emailing me and screaming, "How could you only include it as a bonus scene on a DVD?!"
Well, of course, that is how Bonus materials work. You go see a movie, and then later you get some of the extra footage on a DVD.
To be honest, I just didn't know how I felt about being "That guy that fucks his models online." For some reason my comfort level is fine with oral activity, but the fucking seems too much for me.
But I got a lot of positive feedback about the DVD version, and I know, yes, I am not young and super hot, but I guess enough of you let me know that it was a hot scene that I felt like the online viewers would be more pleased than picky.
Plus I knew I wanted to do a MEGA Director's Cut that would have even more than what I put on the DVD. So now the DVD buyer's are gonna be emailing me mad! LOL!
So even this version has quite a bit more naughtiness than the DVD.
I thought it would be great to toss it out there this weekend as a "Not a Regularly Scheduled Release," since it's not actually a "new" video, but ~ahem~ a far hotter version!
title: Bryan & Lansing - Serviced DC
